citations.narrative:
A young rhesus macaque (NHP) in 2233 was seen during inspection to have moved the hind portion of its body out of the
enclosure past the hips through a gap in a door on the front of a collection enclosure. The NHP then moved back into the
enclosure. An additional panel to cover the gap that it had gotten partially through was put in place immediately by
personnel. There were 20 NHP's housed in this area during the inspection; however by the time of the inspection exit
interview the door with the gap in it was no longer part of their primary housing. This gap by the door of smaller NHP's
could allow them to get out and/or injured. Ensure that this gap is not present for this group of NHP's if they are housed in
these primary enclosures.
***Correction: Ensure item is corrected prior to using the affected enclosure doors again on this group of NHP's or other
NHP's that could possibly fit through the gap.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
3.80(a)(2)(iii) 
   
Primary enclosures. 
A young rhesus macaque (NHP) in 2233 was seen during inspection to have moved the hind portion of its body out of the 
enclosure past the hips through a gap in a door on the front of a collection enclosure. The NHP then moved back into the 
enclosure. An additional panel to cover the gap that it had gotten partially through was put in place immediately by 
personnel. There were 20 NHP's housed in this area during the inspection; however by the time of the inspection exit 
interview the door with the gap in it was no longer part of their primary housing. This gap by the door of smaller NHP's 
could allow them to get out and/or injured. Ensure that this gap is not present for this group of NHP's if they are housed in 
these primary enclosures. 
***Correction: Ensure item is corrected prior to using the affected enclosure doors again on this group of NHP's or other 
NHP's that could possibly fit through the gap. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
